column2: "Nna EWURADZE fi ehum no mu buaa Job dɛ
column4: "Woana nye nyia ɔnam nsɛm a nyimdzee nnyi mu do bir afotu enyi yi?"

column2: "Afei bɔ w'asen do dɛ barimba; Na mibebisa wo
"Aber a motoo asaase ne fapem no na ɔwo ewɔ hen? Sɛ ewɔ ntseasee a
"Woana na ɔdze no nsusui too hɔ
column3: sɛ inyim a? Anaa woana na ɔtseen ahoma mu wɔ do?"

column2: "Ebɛnadze do na wɔdze ne fapem tsintsimii? Anaa woana na ɔdze kutuwdo bo no toe?"
"Aber a adzekyee nworaba bɔɔ mu toow ndwom
column3: Na Sor dɔm nyinara bɔɔ ose wɔ enyigye ntsi no?"

column2: "Anaa woana na ɔtotoow po mbobow mu. Aber a obui faa do
column3: dɛ gyama ofi yafun mu rupue no;"

column2: "Aber a medze mununkum yɛɛ n'akataho Na sum kebii so yɛɛ n'abɔyamu no
column10: Na eha ara na w'asorɛkye ntsɛntsɛn no mbegyina

column2: "Ana ofitsi dɛ wo nda hyɛɛ ase yi ahyɛ anapa do pɛn
column3: Na ama adzekyee ehu ne dzibew;"

column2: "Ama ɔaata esuo asaase n'atsaban mu
column3: Na wɔaapopo ndzebɔnyɛfo efi do da?"

column2: "Ɔadan dɛ dɛtse a ɔhyɛ nsɔwano ase; Na ndzɛmba nyinara sisi hɔ dɛ ntar:"
"Na hɔn kan no wɔdze akam ndzebɔnyɛfo
column3: Na abasa a wɔama do no woebu mu."

column2: "Ana akɛhɛn po no nsunyiwa mu? Anaa anantsew bun eduodoo eduodoo mu?"
"Ana woeyi wu no mbobotsen no akyerɛ wo? Anaa ehu wu no nwinwin mbobotsen no?"
"Ana ehu asaase ne tɛtɛr mu? Sɛ inyim ne nyinara a
"Ehen na kwan a wɔdze kɔ kan ne tsenabew wɔ
"Ma ɔwo edze bɔkɔ ne he do
column3: Na ɔwo ahyɛ ne fi ho akwan no nsew?"

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
"Ana akɛhɛn esukwankyɛba no korabea
column3: Anaa ehu sorbo no korabea no
column6: Ama ko na sa da no?"

column2: "Ebɛn kwan na kan nam do hyerɛn
column3: Dza ɔdze boka mframa bɔ asaase do no?"

column2: "Woana na oeyiyi aka ama nsuyirii
column3: Anaa kwan ama senaman n'enyinam no;"

column2: "Dɛ ɔbɛma nyankom atɔ asaase mbrɛ nyimpa nnyi no do; Sar a nyimpa nnyi mu no do;"
"Dɛ ɔbɛma daadzehun amamfo no amee; Na ɔama mfunoma no afefɛw?"
"Ana nyankom wɔ egya? Anaa woana na ɔwoo bɔsu a ɔsosɔw no?"
"Woana ne yafun mu na nsubo fi ba? Na sor bɔsu kyenkyenee no
"Nsu da dɛ ɔbo
"Ana ɔwo ibotum akyekyer Aberwa na mba no n'ahoma
"Ana ɔwo botum eyi ewia kwan mu nworaba no epue wɔ ne ber mu? Anaa egya Ɔbɔɔ nda esuon nye ne mba?"
"Ana ɔwo inyim sor mbra? Na ibotum ahyehyɛ no tumdzi wɔ asaase do?"
"Ana ɔwo ibotum ama wo ndze do ekodu mununkum mu
column3: Ama nsu pii aabɛkata wo do?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo ibotum asoma enyinam
"Woana na ɔdze nyansa ahyɛ akoma mu? Anaa woana na ɔdze ntseasee ama adwen?"
"Woana na ɔdze nyansa botum akan mununkum? Anaa woana na ohue sor nsu nkotoku no gu
column4: "Aber a huntuma no pem yɛ siw
column5: Na dɛtse atɔw atɔw no abɔ mu afemfam ho no?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo na eyɛ ha nya afonam ma gyataber
column6: Na wɔtsetse dɔtɔ mu dɛ wɔretsɛw no?"

column2: "Woana na osiesie akonkoran n'edziban ma no
column3: Aber a ne mba su frɛ Nyankopɔn
column4: Na wokyin wɔ edziban a ho ayɛ dzen ntsi no?"
